src_original: ekāṅga vikalāṃ hīnāṃ śilpinīṃ śvapacikāṃ tathā
tatvasyemāni mantra vījapadāni bhavanti - om āḥ huṃ
yena yena hi vadhyante jantavo raudra karmaṇā
sopāyena tu tenaiva mucyante bhava vandhanāt ||6 ||
bhāvayet satataṃ mantrī dehaṃ prakṛta nirmalaṃ ||11 ||
na kaṣṭa kalpanāṃ kūryyānnopavāsaṃ na ca kriyāṃ
snānaṃ śaucaṃ na caivātra grāma dharma vivarjanaṃ ||13 ||  na cāpi vandayedyevān kāṣṭha pāṣāṇa mṛṇmayān
śaila mṛṇmaya caityādīn na kuryān pustakeratiṃ
gamyāgamya vikalpaṃ tu bhakṣyā bhakṣyaṃ tathaivaca  peyā peyaṃ tathā mantrī kuryyānaiva samāhitaḥ ||20 ||
sarva varṇa samudbhutā jugupsā naiva yoṣitaḥ
vakṣye'haṃ vajrasattvasya saṃkṣepāt sādhanaṃ param ||1 ||  niyama vratopavāsai - rakṣaroccāraṇa-bhāvanaiḥ
utpatti sthiti nirodhañca asaṃpṛkta pṛthag janaiḥ  tasya bhāvetu saṃsāro nānyatra pralayodbhavaḥ ||27 ||
dinaṃ tu bhagavānvajrī naktaṃ prajñā vidhīyate
evaṃ matvā tu vai yogī yo bhāvayed vuddhimān sadā
sa sidhyati na sandeho mandaṃ puṇyopi mānavaḥ ||31 ||
viṇvajrodaka vījādyai rnāsikābhyantarod bhavaiḥ  pūjayet satataṃ mantrī ātmānaṃ tattva bhāvanaiḥ ||3 ||
